title: What is something about human psychology that almost nobody knows? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many phenomena and psychological facts that may leave us in awe once we know about them… Y.our height is generally determined by your father. Intelligence, emotional strength and body shape is determined by the mother.The type of music you listen to affects the way you perceive the world.Biochemically speaking, being in a romantic love affair cannot be distinguished from having an obsessive compulsive disorder.Convincing yourself you slept well tricks your brain into thinking it did.If you announce your goals to others, you're less likely to succeed. Studies confirm you lose motivation.The very last person on your mind before you fall asleep is either the reason for your happiness or your pain.Your mind rewrites monotonous speeches of boring people to make it sound interesting.While money can buy happiness to an extent, studies show that after 49 lakhs (approx) per year, increased income does little to boost happiness.Being with positive, happy people keeps you happier.It is possible to die from a broken heart. It's called Stress Cardiomyopathy.The more you spend on others, the happier you feel90% of people text things they can't say in person.Your favourite song is your favourite because you associate an emotional event with it.Your decisions are more rational when thought in another language.Smarter people underestimate themselves. Ignorant people think they're brilliant.People between the ages of 18 and 33 are the most stressed in the world. After the age of 33, stress levels tend to reduce.Money spent on experiences will always hold greater value to you.Singing reduces feelings of depression and anxiety.Feeling ignored causes the same chemical effect as that of an injury.Our hearts have nothing to do with the feeling of being in love! It's only a chemical reaction of the brain.Some of us are actually afraid of being too happy because of the fear that something tragic might happen next.Your brain treats rejection like a physical pain.Psychologically proven, it only takes 4 minutes to fall in love.The longer you hide your feelings for someone, the harder you fall for that person.When you try to remember a past event, you're actually remembering the last time you remembered it rather than the event itself.70% of the time, your brain is only replaying memories and creating scenarios of perfect moments.98% of the time when someone says they've to ask you a question, you recall all the bad things you've done recently.The average high school kid today shows the same level of anxiety as the average psychiatric patient in the 1950s.No one born blind has ever developed schizophrenia.Scientists claim most Internet trolls are narcissistic, sadistic and psychopathic in nature.Comedians and funny people are actually more depressed than others.When someone cries tears of joy, the first teardrop would always come from the right eye.Tears of pain start from the left.People who oversleep tend to crave more sleep.When you're single,all you see are happy couples; and when you're not, you find happy singles.Closing your eyes helps you remember things.There is a gene that can cause you to be negative most of the time.Around 80% of people use music as an escape from all the negative things in life.People will associate the adjectives you use on others with you. This phenomenon is called “unconscious feature transfer”. When you say that a person is sincere and kind, people will relate these qualities to you.When a person dies, they have 7 minutes of brain activity left in which they see a dream-like sequence of their memories.70% of your dreams contain secret messages. They carry more weight and meaning than our conscious thoughts.If you have a crush on someone, your brain will find it impossible to lie to that person.People who understand sarcasm well are often good at reading people's minds.Staying quiet often means that you don't think the other person is ready to hear your thoughts.The way you dress is linked with your mood.So dressing well most often helps in keeping you more stably happy.Being able to instantly respond with sarcasm to a silly question is a sign of a healthy brain.Pretending not to care is the habit of someone who generally cares the most.Women with higher IQs have a harder time in finding a mate.The cells in your body react to everything your mind says. So negativity brings down your immune system and you feel sick.People who spend more time in the sun are likely to be happier.People with low self-esteem are more likely to criticize others.Acting as though you own an item makes you more probable to buying it.The more you talk about someone, the more are you likely to fall in love with that person.Chocolate and shopping are more addictive than LSD and steroids.Online dating and online shopping follow the same psychological principle.People fascinated by serial killers are better conversationalists.You can only remember 3 to 4 things at a time.Good morning and good night text messages activate the part of the brain responsible for happiness.People look more attractive when they speak about the things they are really interested in.

Hello Jerry Tan Why it’s me your favorite? :D Anyway, thank you "again" for this question. :D Human psychology/behaviour is just one of the most interesting to study about. Knowing some of the facts will get you ahead of the crowd. It’s also entertaining once you start knowing them. Here we go. If you are in total darkness for more than three days, you can become permanently blind.When someone misses you, there is an 80% chance that they will appear in your dream.70% of people lay in bed at night remembering past conversations, imagining what they should have said instead.You have no sense of smell when you are asleep.You want more choices and information than you can actually process.What people look at on a picture or screen depends on what you say to them. To clarify this point, let us take an example. Look at the picture below: What did you see? It’s just a picture of a group of friends right? Did you notice anything strange? No? What if I say that there's something strange in the picture. You did pay a second look right? And you are now concentrating to see what is the strange thing I’ve said. Have you now noticed that there's No seat or bench?. They are sitting in the air! Yes, you finally see the picture very well now. But why didn’t you notice it before? It’s because I’ve put the picture without telling you what to look out for. So when I said that there is no seat, only then you noticed it. Cool isn’t it? :D Ever wonder why our gut instincts are so strong and why things sometimes work out better when we follow it? That’s because our subconscious mind often knows what’s better for us much before our conscious mind understands it.When you become really close to someone, you can hear their voice in your head when you read their texts.It would take about 1000 years to watch all the videos on youtube.The average woman will pack about 26 items in her suitcase that she’ll never need. Studies found that children who are better liars, tend to become more succesful adults.Worrying about getting sick can actually make you sick.People who get embarrassed easily, tend to be more trustworthy, loyal, honest and generous.People who tend to daydream more are better at solving problems and tend to be more creative. Are you a daydreamer? :DPeople are so jealous of their neighbours that they don’t feel satisfied and successful until they are superior than them.Your mind can sense someone staring at you even while you are asleep. It’s impossible to remain angry at someone you truly love. Anger lasting for more than three days indicates that you are not inlove.Psychologically, it is impossible to be just friends with someone you have fallen in love with.We do not realize how much we love something until we lose it.When a guy really likes a girl, he can’t help but tell his friends about her.According to study, if you are always the one to text a person first, there's a 90% chance that this person isn’t interested in you.Couples who meet online often end up marrying.People with a dominant or charismatic personality can easily affect crowd opinions and manipulate groups into doing their bidding. I’m not talking about Christian Grey. Am I? :D    Some of us are actually afraid of being too happy because of the fear that something tragic might happen next.People text faster to someone they like most.Psychological study found that men often find funny women intimidating.When a person dies, their sense of hearing is the last to go. Be careful what to say about the corpse :DThe higher your IQ, the more you dream.It takes 4 seconds for the silence to be awkward.Men can love 2 to 4 girls at the same time. Woman can’t. Who’s loyal now? :DGuy seek advice from a girl, not from a guy.Cursing when you are hurt helps to reduce the pain.Hearing someone call out your name when nobody has actually called out your name, is a sign of healthy mind.Sleep deprived men are more likely to assume that women want to have sex with them.According to study, some women have ended a relationship because their significant other was too busy playing video games.A man can like you for a moment and forget you later on.Smiling is contagious. Do it more often :)Thanks for scrolling. I’m Bella Have a great day ahead world ;)
